BR.name: Metroid Prime™: Federation Force Blast Ball Demo
BR.description: Seis mechs. Dois times. Um passe livre para jogar o mais intenso jogo de ficção científica de três contra três no universo de Metroid™. Jogue a bola, acerte o gol e junte power-ups enquanto luta. Melhore a sua pontaria ou até faça seus oponentes ejetar de seus mechs! Alcance a vitória localmente ou online enquanto se prepara para o jogo completo Metroid Prime™: Federation Force.

CA.name: Metroid Prime™: Federation Force Blast Ball Demo
CA.description: The online multiplayer feature for the Metroid Prime: Federation Force Blast Ball demo has been discontinued. Please continue to enjoy the single player and local wireless modes in the demo. Thanks for playing! For more information, visit http://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/metroid-prime-blast-ball-demo-3ds. Six mechs. Two teams. One free pass to play the most intense 3-on-3 sci-fi sport in the Metroid™ universe. Literally shoot the ball into the goal and grab power-ups as you fight. Increase your firing rate or even eject opponents from their mechs! Score victory locally or online* as you prepare for the full game Metroid Prime™: Federation Force.

MX.name: Metroid Prime™: Federation Force Blast Ball Demo
MX.description: Seis mekas, dos equipos y un pase libre para jugar el deporte futurista de 3 contra 3 más intenso del universo de Metroid™. Dispara la bola hacia la portería contraria mientras obtienes mejoras que utilizarás durante el partido. Aumenta la potencia de tu rayo o ¡expulsa a tu oponente de su meka! Consigue la victoria en juego local o en línea mientras te preparas para la versión completa de Metroid Prime™: Federation Force.
